metadata.title: CVE-2020-22402 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in SOGo Web Mail before 4.3.1allows attackers to obtain user sensitive information when a user reads anemail containing malicious code.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-22402` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sogo - 5.10.0-2
sogo-activesync - 5.10.0-2
sogo-common - 5.10.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sogo package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.10.0-2').
